title: Iulia Dumanska
text:
Iulia Dumanska (born 15 August 1996) is a Romanian professional <a href="handball">handball</a>er who plays as a goalkeeper for <a href="RK%20Podravka%20Koprivnica">RK Podravka Koprivnica</a> and the <a href="Romania%20women%27s%20national%20handball%20team">Romanian national team</a>.
Early life.
Born in a family of athletes, Dumanska started playing handball at the age of 11 in her hometown of <a href="Horodenka">Horodenka, Ukraine</a>. Three years later she was discovered by the Martas and signed with their club Marta Baia Mare. She later graduated from high school from Anghel Saligny High School in <a href="Baia%20Mare">Baia Mare</a>. Iulia now lives in Romania where she became Romanian citizen on 5 May 2016.
Personal life.
Dumanska speaks fluent <a href="Romanian%20language">Romanian</a> and proudly sings the national anthem of Romania. She was given the award of "Cetățean de onoare" ("<a href="Honorary%20citizen%23Honorary%20citizenship">Honorary Citizen</a>") of the city of <a href="Craiova">Craiova</a> in 2018.
External links.
